title: Alessandra Ambrosio wigs out with pixie-cut hairpiece on Malibu set of Roberto Cavalli photo shoot
text:
IMG Model Alessandra Ambrósio wigged out on the Malibu set of her latest fashion photo shoot on Thursday.

The 38-year-old mother-of-two appeared to channel Keeping Up with the Kardashians momager Kris Jenner with her pixie-cut hairpiece covering her natural shoulder-length locks.

The Brazilian bombshell flashed her effervescent smile as she posed beside a classic convertible resembling the 1966 Ford Thunderbird driven in Thelma and Louise.

Based on the white T-shirt Alessandra was sporting, the seaside shoot appeared to be for the new Roberto Cavalli campaign.

However, the gold motorcycle jacket and white pleated pants did little to highlight Ambrósio's phenomenal 5ft9in figure.

Missing from the Fyre Festival paid promoter's side on Thursday was her Italian boyfriend since July 2018, Alanui co-designer Nicoló Oddi.

The MasterChef guest star has two children - daughter Anja Louise, 11; and son Noah Phoenix, 7 - with her ex-fiancé, Re/Done denim founder Jamie Mazur.

The former couple split in March 2018 following a decade-long engagement.
